personal.name: Fidelzky
personal.title: WordPress Developer & Vibe Coder
personal.bio: Passionate WordPress developer crafting digital experiences with clean code and creative solutions. Specializing in custom themes, plugin development, and performance optimization. Always coding with good vibes!

projects.title: Custom WordPress Theme
projects.description: A fully responsive, custom WordPress theme built from scratch with modern design principles and optimized performance.

projects.title: E-Commerce Plugin
projects.description: Custom WooCommerce extension for enhanced product management and checkout experience.

projects.title: Headless WordPress API
projects.description: RESTful API implementation for headless WordPress architecture with React frontend.

projects.title: Custom Gutenberg Blocks
projects.description: Collection of custom Gutenberg blocks for enhanced content editing experience.

projects.title: Performance Optimization Tool
projects.description: WordPress plugin for automated performance optimization including image compression and caching.

projects.title: Multisite Management Dashboard
projects.description: Custom dashboard for managing multiple WordPress sites from a single interface.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.text: Fidelzky delivered an exceptional WordPress solution that exceeded our expectations. The code quality and attention to detail is outstanding!

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.text: Working with Fidelzky was a breeze. The custom theme they built perfectly captures our brand identity and performs flawlessly.

testimonials.name: Mike Johnson
testimonials.text: The WooCommerce extension Fidelzky developed has significantly improved our checkout process. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Sarah Williams
testimonials.text: Professional, responsive, and incredibly skilled. Fidelzky transformed our WordPress site into a modern, high-performance platform.
